sparkling_gift.name: Sparkling Gesture
sparkling_gift.summary: Find a glittering keepsake that Alicia can gift to Laura.
sparkling_gift.description: Alicia wants to surprise Laura with a shimmering token. She believes a rare teardrop crystal from the lower tunnels would be perfect.
objectives: Locate a Glittering Teardrop in the dungeon.
Return it to Alicia so she can craft a gift for Laura.

golden_promise.name: Golden Promise
golden_promise.summary: Secure an ornate ring so Laura can work with new material.
golden_promise.description: Laura needs an unmarked golden band taken from a rare undead. She is willing to pay well for anyone brave enough to retrieve it.
objectives: Acquire an Untarnished Signet from the depths.
Deliver the ring to Laura at her forge.

q1_qualification.name: The Qualification Exam
q1_qualification.summary: Prove your worth by defeating Ifrit.
q1_qualification.description: To become a SeeD, you must venture into the Inferno Cave and obtain Ifrit's acknowledgement.

q2_seed_inauguration.name: SeeD Inauguration
q2_seed_inauguration.description: You have passed the exam. Speak to the Headmaster to receive your uniform.
objectives: Speak to Cid in the office.

q3_radio_tower.name: The Radio Tower
q3_radio_tower.description: Galbadian forces have seized the Dollet Radio Tower. Retake it.

q4_secure_tower.name: Secure the Tower
q4_secure_tower.description: The spider bot is rampant. Destroy it before it destroys the town.

q5_escape_ruins.name: Escape the Ruins
q5_escape_ruins.description: The mission is compromised. Retreat to the beach.

q6_report_headmaster.name: Debriefing
q6_report_headmaster.description: Tell Cid what happened at the tower.

q7_timber_resistance.name: Timber Resistance
q7_timber_resistance.description: Meet the contact in the Forest Outpost.

q8_resistance_contact.name: The Contact
q8_resistance_contact.description: Speak the password to the bar owner: 'But the owls are still around'.

q9_train_heist.name: Train Heist
q9_train_heist.description: Navigate the train cars and decouple the VIP carriage.

q10_broadcast_hijack.name: Broadcast Hijack
q10_broadcast_hijack.description: Use the radio equipment to broadcast the resistance message.

q11_sorceress_sighting.name: Sorceress Sighting
q11_sorceress_sighting.description: A sorceress has been seen near the Iron Institute.

q12_assassination_plot.name: Assassination Plot
q12_assassination_plot.description: The Sorceress Edea must be stopped. Take the shot.

q13_failed_mission.name: Broken Chains
q13_failed_mission.description: The assassination failed. We are captured in the Desert Prison.

q14_prison_break.name: Prison Break
q14_prison_break.description: Fight your way up the prison floors.

q15_missile_base.name: Missile Threat
q15_missile_base.description: Missiles are targeted at the Academy. Infiltrate the base and set the self-destruct.

q16_time_compression.name: Time Compression
q16_time_compression.description: Confront the Sorceress in her chamber and stop the compression.
